simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Simulator Interface Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Simulator Interface application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) SIM data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the SIM application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by SIM application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the SIM application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the SIM application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the SIM application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: Simulator Interface Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by SIM application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the SIM application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function initializes SIM's configuration tables. This includes <TODO>.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Obtain SIM configuration tables data pointers.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function manages the configuration tables and obtains a pointer to their data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function validates SIM's configuration table

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the table to validate.
